alert.note: Alert for Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:15PM CDT until July 10 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LUBBOCK...NORTHEASTERN LYNN AND WESTERN CROSBY COUNTIES... At 1115 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Downtown Lubbock, or 5 miles east of Lubbock, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Slaton, Idalou, Ransom Canyon, Texas Tech University, Lubbock International Airport, Downtown Lubbock, Lubbock South Plains Mall, Buffalo Springs and Lubbock Science Spectrum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
